app.not_pocket_tip: That folder doesn't look like the Pocket's file system. The SD card must be initialised by the Pocket at least once.

clean_files.title: Clean Files

core_info.author: Author

requires_license.all: Warning - this core currently requires a license file to run.
requires_license.jotego:
The JOTEGO betas require a JTBETA file from the Patreon in the sponsors section below. 
The jtbeta.zip should be placed at the root of your SD card then it'll be found & copied to the right place during the "Required Files" process.

core_info.replaced: This core has been replaced by <1>{replacementCore}</1>

core_info_required_files.no_link_tip: Please view the Settings section for more options with required files

cores.install_tip: You can also install cores (or anything else in a zip) by dragging the .zip into this window

error.report: You can report this via GitHub include the text below & whatever you just did

new.archive_tip: This won't work for achives where the files are zipped, and you should set which extensions you want to avoid downloading the metadata files.
new.title: Add new Fetch

fetch.remove_confirm: This'll remove the fetch configuration, but not the files. Are you sure?

mister_sync.tip_1: The MiSTer's FTP must be turned on

screenshots.no_screenshots: Once you take some screenshots they'll appear here

alternate_skip.ramble_1:
This setting will skip processing json files under the `_alternatives` folder,
meaning you'll just get the "main" titles for the cores which sort their JSON files this way.
alternate_skip.ramble_2: Warning: turning this off will mean that installing Required Files takes much longer.
alternate_skip.title: Skip Alternate Assets

archive.title: ROM & BIOS archive
archive.warning:
Please check with your local laws around the downloading of potentially copyrighted (arcade) ROM & BIOS files.
If you are comfortable with this, copy the following url into the input and hit "save".

clear_file_cache.ramble:
To help with USB & SD card transfer larger files are copied & stored on your computer's file system,
which should be fine but if you're running into issues try clearing the file cache.
clear_file_cache.title: Clear file cache

disconnect.ramble: Return to the "Connect To Pocket" screen (This doesn't eject the SD Card / USB drive)
disconnect.title: Disconnect

reconnect.ramble: Attempt to reconnect to the most recently opened location <1> { ppath } </1> upon opening the app, skipping the "Connect to Pocket" button
reconnect.title: Reconnect when the app is opened

uninstall_core.confirm_text: This will remove the core, but not any games, saves, library data, or platform information. Are you sure?

zip_install.moved_files_info: Handles cases where files have moved, e.g. JSON files are now in `_alternatives`

replace.text:
{list}

Assets, Saves etc will be moved over and the old core will be removed.
replace.title: Replace Cores?
